name: Momotraitor
description:
You have been sent on a quest to kill the Demon Lord terrorizing the land. However, you hate your companions, and they hate you back.

While you try to kill them, they'll do their best to annoy and inconvenience you. These interactions will be shown through missions that you must complete.

If Taro dies, or you fail to complete a mission, you will lose the game even if you beat the boss.

If you want to cancel an action, click outside of the menu UI.

Goodluck!
